segments.text: Send an ambulance fast ! My husband is having a heart attack !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Slow down and tell me your address .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I live on 1177 Oak lane in Smithfield . Oh , hurry , I don't know what to do !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: An ambulance is on its way right now . They should be there any minute . Are you close to him right now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , yes , he's right here by me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , he's breathing , but he's not conscious ! Oh , please hurry !
segments.speaker: S2
